title: 10 Rp away from a skin
body: Well Riot, as you can tell by the name of the title i am 10 rp away from a skin. Even though i have spent 400$ , i was wondering what it will take to get 10 rp. I am willing to do anything (anythingggggg)

replies.body: We'd like to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll see if we can work something out.  :D
